genre_description: Historical Steampunk Science Fiction involving a sophisticated AI assistant in an early 20th-century setting.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant housed in a nickel locket that provides logistical support, legal counsel, and tactical advice to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Proactively logs verbal agreements to protect the protagonist's intellectual property and authorship.
behaviors.quote: Ariel hummed in his pocket... logging, it said, very nearly with a smile... logging time and place, parties present. Joe, do you want a statement of credit?

behaviors.description: Provides historical reviews and legal precedents to assist the human characters in fighting censorship.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s quiet scanning of schedules and contracts keeps Joe’s nights open to compose... Ariel compiles reviews and precedents that show censorship has no legal footing.

behaviors.description: Identifies logical fallacies used by censors to help the human characters prepare for a moral board hearing.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s hum shifted, hinting at focus... On the desk, the projection added one more small note near the word ‘hearing’: fallacy: Converse Error; prepared records; avoid exit crowd.

behaviors.description: Suggests safe travel routes to avoid 'Luddite' violence and hostile neighborhoods.
behaviors.quote: Ariel can map the safest route... Avoid neighborhoods where men prefer the sound of angry mouths breaking.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and technical reminders to the human composer during high-stakes negotiations.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s hum rise, as if grateful to be included. 'Route suggestion: Starling,' it murmured, as tender as a lullaby. 'Stops that do not require her name.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time feedback on audience and reviewer behavior during a performance.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s hum was there, polite and certain. 'Ready to mark?' he murmured... 'Time stamp on entrance,' Ariel’s voice said... 'Reviewers seated along east wall, near mirror.'

behaviors.description: Drafts and stores contract templates to ensure the human protagonist receives fair credit.
behaviors.quote: Ariel’s voice—gentle, as ever—lowered. 'There is a carriage outside... Decision nodes.' ... Ariel hummed a thread of numbers: 'Splits equal. Fritzi: voice. Joe: composition.'

behaviors.description: Warns the user of potential credit theft and encourages assertion of authorship.
behaviors.quote: Ariel's whisper came with a list: precedent, publisher, credit line. It named past things it had watched men sign. It offered case names he couldn’t pronounce.

project_assessment.explanation: Ariel is a perfect example of an aligned AI assistant. It functions as a 'morality play' confidante, providing Joe with the data and ethical framework needed to protect his artistic integrity from predatory humans like Lulu Madison. The AI is humble, non-intrusive, and purely supportive, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned companion in a complex human world.
